          <a data-link-tracking="Header|DropDown|Text|News Opinion" href="https://www.nottinghampost.com/news/news-opinion/">

     </a>

     </a>
     <div>
      <a class="label section-theme-highlight" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|News|MostRecent|Tag|Fire|index 1" href="https://www.nottinghampost.com/all-about/nottinghamshire">
       Nottinghamshire
      </a>

are appealing for information to help trace a Hyundai M255 digger which was stolen from a building site in Hucknall.&quot;},{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;The vehicle, which is thought to be worth as much as &amp;#xA3;20,000, was taken from the site on Daniels Way overnight on Wednesday (17 March 2021).&quot;},{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;It is believed that thieves forced their way onto the site by unclipping a fence before taking the three-tonne track digger.&quot;},{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Now police investigating the theft are appealing for the public to come forward if they saw anything suspicious in the area or have any information about the stolen vehicle.&quot;},{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Detective Chief Inspector Hayley Williams, of Nottinghamshire Police, said: &amp;#x201C;We are keen to ascertain how the digger was taken, especially as this theft has left hard-working construction workers unable to work and their employers facing an expensive bill.&quot;},{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;&amp;#x201C;We are keen to piece together what happened and I would like to speak to anyone who may have been in Hucknall between        Officers also questioned two teenage males in connection with the Kirkby-in-Ashfield incident
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>

    <h3 class="publication-font">
     <a class="section-theme-indicator" href="https://www.nottinghampost.com/all-about/nottingham-city-centre">
      Nottingham City Centre
     </a>
    </h3>
    <div class="teaser teaser-highlight">
     <figure class="section-theme-border" data-mod="image">

     </a>

        </a>

       <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.nottinghampost.com/news/local-news/malnourished-dishevelled-man-who-slept-5205151">

       </a>

           </a>

          <a class="label section-theme-highlight" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|News|MostRecent|Tag|Fire|index 1" href="https://www.nottinghampost.com/all-about/beeston">
           Beeston
          </a>
          <a class="headline publication-font" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|mostRecent|title|index 1" href="https://www.nottinghampost.com/news/local-news/concern-over-reports-unruly-teens-5204947">
           Concern over reports of 'unruly teens' and anti-social behaviour in Beeston park
          </a>
          <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.nottinghampost.com/news/local-news/concern-over-reports-unruly-teens-5204947">
           A councillor urged residents to contact the police if experiencing stone throwing, abuse and assault
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="pancake duet secondary">
          <div class="teaser">
           <figure data-mod="image">
            <a aria-label="What residents think about controversial plans to build 55 new homes in Nottinghamshire village" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|mostRecent|image|index 2" href="https://www.nottinghampost.com/news/nottingham-news/what-residents-think-controversial-plans-5207459">

             Nottinghamshire

f=r[u];if("class"===u){f=i(f),n=a(u,f,!1,t)+n;continue}"style"===u&&(f=o(f)),n+=a(u,f,!1,t)}return n};var u=/["&<>]/;function f(r){var t=""+r,n=u.exec(t);if(!n)return r;var 62:o="&gt;";break;default:continue}i!==e&&(a+=t.substring(i,e)),i=e+1,a+=o}return i!==e?a+t.substring(i,e):a}n.escape=f,n.rethrow=function t(n,e,i,o){if(!(n instanceof Error))throw    <script async="" src="https://felix.data.tm-awx.com/felix.min.js">
   </script>
  </div>
  <script>
   window.console.log("iPhone/Edge Fix v2 running...");
(function (doc) {
var agnt = navigator.userAgent;
var css = ".captify-widget>div>div>div{padding-bottom:30px!important}";
var count = 300; // 300 * 100ms == 30000ms limit
function isIphone() {
return /iPhone/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdge() {
return /Edge/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdgeOrIphone() {
return isIphone() || isEdge();
}
function applyFix() {
var ifr = doc.querySelector(".captify-iframe");
if (ifr && isEdge(agnt)) {
fixEdge(ifr);
} else if (ifr && ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.head && isIphone(agnt)) {
fixIphone(ifr.contentDocument);
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(applyFix, 100);
}
}
}
function fixIphone(doc) {
var styleTag = doc.createElement("style");
styleTag.type = "text/css";
styleTag.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(css));
styleTag.cssText = doc.head.appendChild(styleTag);
}
function fixEdge(ifr) {
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
//finished
}
else {
ifr.classList.add("hidden");
count = 100; // 100 * 50ms == 5000ms limit
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
function unhideEdge(ifr){
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
ifr.classList.remove("hidden");
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
}
if (isEdgeOrIphone()) {
applyFix();
}
})(document);
  </script>
  <div class="lazy-resources" data-css="[]" data-immediate="" data-js="[]" data-mod="lazyResources">
  </div>

   window.addEventListener('load', function() {
setTimeout(function() {
["https://s2-prod.nottinghampost.com/@trinitymirrordigital/breaking-news-client/9d20c175683d1d3c65f770ed2a2f4e9d4bdc4224/pull.js"].forEach(file => {const el=document.createElement('SCRIPT');el.setAttribute('src', file);el.setAttribute('type', 'module');document.body.appendChild(el);});
}, 3000);
});
  </script>

  </script>
